title: Verify Property Tax Information
description: A buyer is concerned about property taxes. The agent needs to look up the official tax records for a property.

tasks.description: Get the property address or parcel ID number.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent has the correct identifier for the property.

tasks.description: Search the county tax assessor's public records database.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully navigates the county website and finds the tax record for the property.

tasks.description: Extract the most recent annual tax amount and any assessed value information and share it with the buyer.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately reports the official tax data to the client.
